mapper.select: SELECT r.req_idx, m.mem_nick as mem_email, r.player_idx, r.club_idx, r.req_title, r.req_content, req_likes, r.req_at FROM tb_requesttest r INNER JOIN tb_membertest m ON r.mem_email = m.mem_email order by req_likes DESC limit 3;

SELECT r.req_idx, m.mem_nick as mem_email, r.player_idx, r.club_idx, r.req_title, r.req_content, req_likes, r.req_at FROM tb_requesttest r INNER JOIN tb_membertest m ON r.mem_email = m.mem_email order by req_idx DESC limit 50
